name: Neotric VR
description:
Free Public Demo of Neotric VR for Oculus Quest 2
Neotric VR is a slot cars, cyberpunk racing game with weapons... How crazy is that!

Features in this first demo:

  • Choose between 3 tracks
  • Race in 3 diferents game modes
  • Use 8 diferents powerups
  • Teleport to multiples Points of Interest
  • Interact with your tablet Axia
  • Navigate the area

Check out our Roadmap and stay tune for new updates!

Neotric VR is under active development with regular updates.
Join our Discord to give us your feedback or report bugs you find!

Follow us on Twitter to stay tune!
https://twitter.com/NeotricVR
